00020 /******************************************************************************/
00021 
00022 #ifndef VMIMMC_ATTRS_H
00023 #define VMIMMC_ATTRS_H
00024 
00025 #include "hostapi/impTypes.h"
00026 #include "vmi/vmiModelInfo.h"
00027 #include "vmi/vmiPorts.h"
00028 #include "vmi/vmiTypes.h"
00029 #include "vmi/vmiTyperefs.h"
00030 #include "vmi/vmiVersion.h"
00031 
00032 
00034 // MMC CONSTRUCTOR, NETLIST AND DESTRUCTOR
00036 
00037 #define VMIMMC_CONSTRUCTOR_FN(_NAME) void _NAME( \
00038     vmimmcComponentP component,         \
00039     Bool             transparent,       \
00040     void            *parameterValues    \
00041 )
00042 typedef VMIMMC_CONSTRUCTOR_FN((*vmimmcConstructorFn));
00043 
00044 #define VMIMMC_LINK_FN(_NAME) void _NAME(vmimmcComponentP component)
00045 typedef VMIMMC_LINK_FN((*vmimmcLinkFn));
00046 
00047 #define VMIMMC_DESTRUCTOR_FN(_NAME) void _NAME(vmimmcComponentP component)
00048 typedef VMIMMC_DESTRUCTOR_FN((*vmimmcDestructorFn));
00049 
00050 
00052 // MODEL REFRESH (AT START OF TIME SLICE)
00054 
00055 #define VMIMMC_REFRESH_FN(_NAME) void _NAME( \
00056     vmimmcComponentP component, \
00057     vmiIASRunState   state      \
00058 )
00059 typedef VMIMMC_REFRESH_FN((*vmimmcRefreshFn));
00060 
00061 
00063 // BUS PORTS
00065 
00066 #define VMIMMC_BUSPORT_FN(_NAME) vmiBusPortP _NAME( \
00067     vmimmcComponentP component, \
00068     vmiBusPortP      prev       \
00069 )
00070 typedef VMIMMC_BUSPORT_FN((*vmimmcBusPortFn));
00071 
00072 
00074 // FORMALS
00076 
00077 //
00078 // Type of function called by simulator to get info about the parameters of this
00079 // model
00080 //
00081 #define VMIMMC_PARAM_SPEC_FN(_NAME) vmiParameterP _NAME( \
00082     vmimmcComponentP component, \
00083     vmiParameterP    prev       \
00084 )
00085 typedef VMIMMC_PARAM_SPEC_FN((*vmimmcParamSpecFn));
00086 
00087 //
00088 // Type of function called by simulator to get the size of the parameter value
00089 // table
00090 //
00091 #define VMIMMC_PARAM_TABLE_SIZE_FN(_NAME) Uns32 _NAME ( \
00092     vmimmcComponentP component  \
00093 )
00094 typedef VMIMMC_PARAM_TABLE_SIZE_FN((*vmimmcParamValueSizeFn));
00095 
00096 
00097 //
00098 // This structure defines attributes for a memory model component
00099 //
00100 typedef struct vmimmcAttrS {
00101 
00103     // VERSION
00105 
00106     const char            *versionString;       // version string
00107     vmiModelType           modelType;           // type of model (enum)
00108     Uns32                  componentSize;       // size in bytes
00109 
00111     // Model status
00113 
00114     vmiVisibility         visibility;           // model visibility (enum)
00115     vmiReleaseStatus      releaseStatus;        // model release status (enum)
00116 
00117 
00119     // CONSTRUCTOR/DESTRUCTOR ROUTINES
00121 
00122     vmimmcConstructorFn    constructorCB;       // constructor
00123     vmimmcLinkFn           linkCB;              // link netlist
00124     vmimmcDestructorFn     destructorCB;        // destructor
00125 
00127     // MODEL REFRESH (AT START OF TIME SLICE)
00129 
00130     vmimmcRefreshFn        refreshCB;           // refresh
00131 
00133     // FULL MODEL CALLBACKS
00135 
00136     vmiMemReadFn           readNFullCB;         // N-byte read callback
00137     vmiMemWriteFn          writeNFullCB;        // N-byte write callback
00138 
00140     // TRANSPARENT MODEL CALLBACKS
00142 
00143     vmiMemWatchFn          readNTransparentCB;  // N-byte read callback
00144     vmiMemWatchFn          writeNTransparentCB; // N-byte write callback
00145 
00147     // FORMAL PARAMETERS iterators to find parameters accepted by this model
00149 
00150     vmimmcParamSpecFn      paramSpecsCB;        // callback for next formal param
00151     vmimmcParamValueSizeFn paramValueSizeCB;    // callback to get size of table
00152 
00154     // PORT ACCESS ROUTINES iterators to find the bus ports
00156 
00157     vmimmcBusPortFn        busPortSpecsCB;      // callback for next bus port
00158 
00160     // Model VLNV
00162 
00163     vmiVlnvInfo  vlnv;
00164 
00165 } vmimmcAttr;
00166 
00167 #endif
